title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 417.3 - Fishing
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 417.3 - Fishing

State Regulations

Fishing shall be permitted in all waters under the
jurisdiction of the office by persons lawfully licensed by the State, by
angling, trolling and through the ice only, except that fishing is prohibited
in the following areas: (a) in all
bathing areas; (b) in all areas
closed to fishing by officially posted signs; Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
417.3

Amended

New

York State Register May 8, 2019/Volume XLI, Issue 19, eff. 5/8/2019

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
